argument.description: Is an expression specifying the table or view to check for a valid identity increment value. table_or_view can be a character string constant enclosed in quotation marks, a variable, a function, or a column name. table_or_view is char, nchar, varchar, or nvarchar.

description: Returns the increment value (returned as numeric (@@MAXPRECISION,0)) specified during the creation of an identity column in a table or view that has an identity column.
